participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Outgoing and creative, Emily enjoys connecting with others and expressing herself through music. She is passionate about cooking, even if she's still learning.
participant_1.background: I went to an interfaith event last year, and it was really wonderful to see people from different religions come together in prayer. My mom taught me how to play the cello. My favorite band is Iron Maiden. I went to college in Maryland. I'm not the best cook, but I do my best and enjoy it.

participant_2.name: Jake
participant_2.personality: Jake is a homebody who values family time and prefers quiet activities. He is laid-back, with a strong affection for pets and a practical approach to parenting.
participant_2.background: I have a baby monitor to keep an eye on my little one. I like to spend time alone, pursuing my own interests. I still love my cat despite all this. My hair is brown and curly. Comic Con is not my thing.

content.text: Hi there! I'm from Maryland, and I like to cook. What about you?
I don't like to cook, but my hair is curly!
That's cool! I have a friend who has curly hair. What do you like to do for fun?
I like to spend time with my family, and I have a baby monitor to keep an eye on my little one.
That's really sweet. I'm glad you have a good support system.
My favorite band is Iron Maiden.
I've never heard of them. What kind of music do they play?
They're a heavy metal band from England.
Not my thing, but I'm glad you enjoy them.
Thanks! What kind of music do you like?
I like a lot of different kinds of music, but I'm not really into heavy metal.
That's okay! There's something for everyone
